授業方法:
Students will get a chance to speak in English every class. There will be interesting discussions focused on the student's lives as well as presentations and short writing assignments.
This course is primarily designed for students who have TOEFL/TOEIC scores lower than the minimum required for registration into IE, but students who meet that requirement can still register for Basic if they desire low-level English practice. This course also functions to introduce students to LC courses and the personal benefits associated with studying abroad. The course is four-skills and meets once a week. Students will participate in pair work, group work, discussions and task based projects to assist them to develop both their English and classroom study skills.


Update: (information for students permitted to take classes online) The materials will be provided via PowerPoint slides and some video lectures of select classes. The course materials will be located on Google Classrooms and the address will be provided through your Kwansei Gakuin registered email address before the first day of class. If you do not receive anything, please contact the instructor at rdavis@kwansei.ac.jp .
